name: The Ignorance
description:
For  GDL - August 2022 Jam

Story

Medieval rejection of science. This does not spare even the man who literally invented the cure for death. You are the scientist who invented the Potion of Immortality. That's why you were killed and sent to hell, and now you have to get out of here. Even if you have to die several times. You still have the potion with you.

Controls

W A S D to Move

LeftMouse/Backspace to Act

R to Restart

F to Fullscreen

Esc to Quit

Team

I did this Game Jam alone. All sounds and music from freesound

P.S.

the original idea of the game mechanics was more interesting, but I did not have time to do it because I'm a silly. maybe I'll finish it later.

at the moment it is impossible to complete the game to the end, you can just collect the keys as much as possible
